img_alt: Woman with dyed hair looks through a stereoscope suspended in a rope installation.

caption:
This work celebrates the history of sexual liberation and feminist empowerment with an immersive, interactive rope installation at Corlears Hook Park in New York City. Stereo views hang at eye-level as visitors look out onto the East River. Intricate webbing invites you into the space and adorns the walls of the amphitheater.
September 15th, 2018

title: Immerse yourself in the installation with this 360 panoramic view.

caption: Photo by Anya Demure
img_alt: Stereo views suspended in an outdoor rope installation.

caption: Modeling by Anya Demure, Rope and Photo by Marceline VQ
img_alt: Black and white photo of a woman suspended in an outdoor installation.

title: Corlears Hook Park
caption: This land has a fascinating history. Before the bridges were constructed this area was the ferry port to Brooklyn - and also the largest concentration of brothels, 87 to be exact (this is where the term “hooker” comes from). Most were woman owned & run and sex work was one of the only ways women could have a decent wage & independence and many took pride in their practice. The wealthiest woman in America in the 1830s was Madame Eliza Jumel. We honor this space and these women with stereo views of women from that time period.
Photo by MissSimoneB

title: Construction
caption: This work was designed and constructed by Marceline, with the help of a trusted team of individuals, including her model and creative partner, Anya Demure. The process took approximately 6 hours and the installation was on display for visitors to interact with for the day, before being taken down that evening.

caption: Collective Museum is a social enterprise that provides tools, space, and support for ordinary people to create anything they can imagine. Their programming creates opportunities for all adults to seduce their own imagination and follow it to a place of inspiration and action. Their vision is to build museums around the world, starting with NYC.
